attributes.action: Death penalty for drug traffickers / and dealers or legalise hard drugs
attributes.additional_details: Over the last 20 to 30 years drugs have become a chronic problem especially drugs like heroin not only in this country but in all wealthy western countries , it does not take a genius to work out why this as happened and it is not being unreasonable if you point your finger at the immigration policies over the last 30 or so years for one of the main contributors to this pariah . The problem is costing British taxpayers a colossal amount of money well into billions of pounds this money could be going to a much better course ,for instance subsidising energy bills for the less well off .
